General.Name: Zhongjing Food Co. Ltd.
General.Description: Zhongjing Food Co., Ltd. engages in the research and development, production, and sale of seasoned foods and seasoning ingredients. It offers mushroom sauce, beef sauce, spicy team hot sauce, mushroom oyster sauce, pepper sauce, and spicy team fresh chili sauce; and flower pepper oil, chili oil, mustard oil, spicy oil, spice stuffing oil, scallion oil, and chengdu red oil, as well as spicy chicken. The company also provides seasonings for noodles, chili fried pork, pepper beef, steamed fish, and tofu; arctic blue and arctic red jams; and hot pot base products. It serves individual families, restaurants, and food production enterprises. In addition, the company engages in the acquisition, processing, and sale of agricultural and forestry products. Zhongjing Food Co., Ltd. was founded in 2022 and is based in Xixia, China.
General.Address: No. 211, N. Sec of Ind. Ave, Xixia, China, 474500
